classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.description:
========
Hatstall
========

Hatstall is a Django app to manage the identities in Sorting Hat. You can
edit, list, merge, unmerge and enroll the identities in SortingHat.

Detailed documentation is in the "docs" directory.

Quick start
-----------

1. Add "hatstall" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

    INSTALLED_APPS = [
        ...
        'hatstall',
    ]

2. Include the hatstall URLconf in your project urls.py like this::

    path('hatstall/', include('hatstall.urls')),

3. Start the development server.

5. Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/hatstall/ to use it.
info.keywords: development repositories analytics git github bugzilla jira jenkins
info.name: django-hatstall
info.summary: A Django app to manage identities in Sorting Hat.
info.html_description:
Hatstall is a Django app to manage the identities in Sorting Hat. You can edit, list, merge, unmerge and enroll the identities in SortingHat.

Detailed documentation is in the “docs” directory.

Quick start

  1. Add “hatstall” to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this:

    INSTALLED_APPS = [
    ...
    'hatstall',
]

  2. Include the hatstall URLconf in your project urls.py like this:

    path('hatstall/', include('hatstall.urls')),

  3. Start the development server.

  1. Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/hatstall/ to use it.
